nodes.text: Orequelandomani was an Advozse religious figure that taught The Twelve Steps.

Orequelandomani was featured in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. The picture used in the book is in fact a reversed promotional image of Bom Vimdin, an onscreen character from Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
